metadata.special_notes: From April 2024, all employees have day-1 right to request (no 26-week qualifying period)

sections.text:
[EMPLOYER_NAME]
[EMPLOYER_ADDRESS]

[DATE]

[EMPLOYEE_NAME]
[EMPLOYEE_ADDRESS]

Dear [EMPLOYEE_NAME],

Re: Flexible Working Request dated [REQUEST_DATE]

I am pleased to confirm that your request to [DESCRIBE_REQUEST - e.g., work from home 3 days per week] has been approved.

Your new working pattern will be:
[NEW_PATTERN]

Effective from: [START_DATE]

This is a permanent change to your contract. Your terms and conditions remain the same except:
[CHANGES_TO_TERMS]

Please sign and return the attached contract variation.

I regret to inform you that your request to [DESCRIBE_REQUEST] cannot be approved for the following business reason(s):

[SELECT FROM:
- Burden of additional costs
- Detrimental effect on ability to meet customer demand  
- Inability to reorganize work among existing staff
- Inability to recruit additional staff
- Detrimental impact on quality
- Detrimental impact on performance
- Insufficiency of work during proposed working periods
- Planned structural changes]

Specific reasons:
[DETAILED_EXPLANATION]

You have the right to appeal this decision within 14 days by writing to [APPEAL_CONTACT].

Your request has been approved on a trial basis for [TRIAL_PERIOD] months, commencing [START_DATE].

We will review the arrangement on [REVIEW_DATE]. If successful, it will become permanent.

I would like to discuss your request at a meeting on [MEETING_DATE] at [MEETING_TIME]. You may be accompanied by a colleague.

Please confirm your attendance.

compliance_checklist: Response within 2 months (3 months by agreement)
If rejected, one of 8 statutory business reasons cited
Right to be accompanied at meeting
